title: Ep. 64: Olympics, 'The Night Of,' and 'Mr. Robot'
description:
The Ringer's Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald discuss NBC's Olympics coverage (6:00), the masterful acting on 'The Night Of' (16:00), the resurgence of 'Mr. Robot' (31:00), and Frank Ocean's missing album (40:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
